data.eml:eml: Piper kelleyi, a hotspot of ecological interactions and a new species from Ecuador and Peru

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tepe, Eric. J., Rodriguez-Castaneda, Genoveva, Glassmire, Andrea E., Dyer, Lee A. (2014): Piper kelleyi, a hotspot of ecological interactions and a new species from Ecuador and Peru. PhytoKeys 34: 19-32, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.34.6376, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.34.6376
